thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 27 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Zhejiang Busen Garments unit to invest 600,000 yuan to set up Hangzhou-based investment fund company with partners

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Zhejiang Busen Garments unit to invest 600,000 yuan to set up Hangzhou-based investment fund company with partners

organizations.name: reuters) - zhejiang busen garments co ltd

text:
Feb 28(Reuters) - Zhejiang Busen Garments Co Ltd :
* Says its unit will invest 600,000 yuan to set up a Hangzhou-based investment fund company with partners
* Says its unit will hold 0.4 percent stake in the target company
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/pLfVAy
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
